mapper.select: SELECT A.s_no, A.s_val, B.u_no, B.s_occupied, C.u_time FROM s_code_d A LEFT JOIN t_seat B ON A.s_no = B.s_no LEFT JOIN t_user C ON B.u_no = C.u_no ORDER BY A.s_no ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_seat (u_no, s_no, s_occupied) VALUES (#{u_no}, #{s_no}, #{s_occupied})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_seat WHERE u_no = #{u_no} AND s_no = #{s_no} AND s_occupied = #{s_occupied}
